de.fhg.fit.biomos.sensorplatform.control

Class HeartRateSampleCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhg.fit.biomos.sensorplatform.control.HeartRateSampleCollector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SampleCollector, Runnable

    public class HeartRateSampleCollector
extends Object
implements SampleCollector
    HeartRateSampleCollector stores heart rate samples to the database and it is able to upload those samples to an external webinterface.
    The class must be used as a singleton. Configured with GUICE to enforce that.
    Author:
    Daniel Pyka

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HeartRateSampleCollector(DBcontroller dbc, HardwarePlatform hwPlatform, Uploader uploader)

      void addToQueue(de.fhg.fit.biomos.sensorplatform.sample.HeartRateSample hrs)
      Add a heart rate sample to the queue for storing it in the database and uploading.
      int getNumberOfHrsInQueue()
      Expose the total number of all heart rate samples in the queue for the manual upload in Controller.
      boolean isUsed()
      The Controller needs to know if the recording period requires a specific SampleCollector (for example using the C2650 sensor requires the CC2650SampleCollector) to be started.
      void manualUpload()
      Method for uploading all heart rate samples in the queue to the specified webinterface.
      void run()
      Try to upload a sample and store it afterwards in this order.
      void setUsed(boolean used)
      The flag is set during creation of the sensorwrapper list in the SensorWrapperFactory and is checked in the Controller at startup of a new recording period.

    • Method Detail

      • isUsed

        public boolean isUsed()
        Description copied from interface: SampleCollector
        The Controller needs to know if the recording period requires a specific SampleCollector (for example using the C2650 sensor requires the CC2650SampleCollector) to be started.
        Specified by:
        isUsed in interface SampleCollector
        Returns:
        true if a sensorcollector is used for the recording period, false otherwise

      • setUsed

        public void setUsed(boolean used)
        Description copied from interface: SampleCollector
        The flag is set during creation of the sensorwrapper list in the SensorWrapperFactory and is checked in the Controller at startup of a new recording period. This is also the interupt flag for the SampleCollector to finish a thread gracefully.
        Specified by:
        setUsed in interface SampleCollector
        Parameters:
        used - true if the SampleCollector is used, false otherwise

      • run

        public void run()
        Try to upload a sample and store it afterwards in this order. Transmission flag is set accordingly. By using this algorithm, the load of the database is minimised.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • addToQueue

        public void addToQueue(de.fhg.fit.biomos.sensorplatform.sample.HeartRateSample hrs)
        Add a heart rate sample to the queue for storing it in the database and uploading.
        Parameters:
        hrs - HeartRateSample retrieved from the sensor

      • getNumberOfHrsInQueue

        public int getNumberOfHrsInQueue()
        Expose the total number of all heart rate samples in the queue for the manual upload in Controller.
        Returns:
        number of heart rate samples

      • manualUpload

        public void manualUpload()
        Method for uploading all heart rate samples in the queue to the specified webinterface. This method is intended to be blocking and only called from the webinterface.
